comment.body: You can set up a ZNC, it's like connecting to an intermediary irc network that is always logged in to the network you want to connect and it can be set up to keep logs
Well, it makes almost anyone doing it look dumber but it may be a way to encourage some excercise into sedentary people. Dunno, there are just so many possibilities...

If you are on windows, or only accessing remote windows computers then RDP is one of the best ways of achieving that, there's rdesktop open source RDP client for linux. For other stuff, it's either VNC or something like that (I think there's something for X). There's also X over SSH but I think that's rather slow. You could give it a try if you are accessing in a LAN.
I see some colors, am I doing it right?
Dude I like the effort you put into your jams and stuff, but I can't dance to this!
by default, that is. And there's a way of making it not consider spaces as argument separators but I don't know
oil Oil OIL!, I'm gonna ditch all the oil ASAP!!!!, 'cuz it's worth nothing~
Yeah, it fixed mine a while ago
